category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 19 (Establishment of Human Rights Management Plan)
contents: Article 19 (Establishment of human rights management plan) ① In order to effectively promote human rights management, the Chairman shall establish a regular plan including the following matters. 1. Goals and basic direction of human rights management 2. Human rights management tasks and implementation strategies 3. Matters related to human rights practice and inspection obligations, including human rights status survey and human rights impact assessment 4. Other matters necessary for human rights protection and promotion ② When establishing a plan pursuant to Paragraph 1, the Chairman shall collect opinions from athletes, sports associations, and related organization employees and reflect them in the plan. Revised 2019. 11. 7. [Moved from Article 18, previous Article 19 moved to Article 20 2019. 11. 7.]
